name: Fruit Cocktail Cake
instructions: Sift in a large bowl the flour, soda, salt, and 1 1?2 cups sugar. Add fruit cocktail (juice and all), eggs, and vanilla. Beat well and pour into a 13 x 8 inch baking pan. Over top of batter sprinkle a mixture of brown sugar and nuts. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or 325° for 50 min- utes. While cake is baking cook together 1 cup sugar, margarine, and evaporated milk. Cook above ingredients together for 5 minutes. Then add coconut, nuts, and vanilla. Mix together and pour over cake while it is still warm.
